name: Non-Stop Space Probe
description:
Take control of the Orblr-1 Space Probe and blast chaotically through the cosmos on your mission to collect precious minerals.

Fly through 40 levels avoiding dangerous space debris and collect the gems before heading to the goal. There's just one problem... once you've started you can't stop!

The first few levels may seem easy, but pretty soon your fingers'll be twitching on the keys at lightning speed to make the perfect dodge.

  • 40 levels with 120 gems to collect
  • Rich, colorful graphics
  • Supports keyboard or gamepad
  • Keeps track of your fails and best times for each level

It's time to blast off, let's go! 🚀🚀🚀
